price: 95. Balobaki naye: Na nkombo ya Allah! Ya sólo, yo ozali penza na libunga nayo ya kala.
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi innaka lafī ḍalālika al-qadīmi
